SEARCH
Package com.telecom.paris.maze.model

Interface MazeModel

All Known Subinterfaces:
Maze
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseMaze
public interface MazeModel
Interface providing various methods required for displaying a maze in a maze editor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addObserver(ModelObserver observer)
    Adds an observer (typically a maze editor) to this maze model so that it can be notified when this maze changes to refresh the editor display.
    void
    clearMaze()
    Turns all the boxes of this maze to empty boxes.
    void
    clearShortestPath()
    Erases the maze's shortest path as computed when method solve was invoked on this maze.

    Returns this maze's height.

    List<String>
    validate()

  • Method Details

    • getMazeFactory

      MazeFactory getMazeFactory()
      Returns a MazeFactory object responsible for instantiating maze models. This is required when the dimensions of the maze should be changed so that the maze editor can create a new maze.
      Returns:
      A MazeFactory object

    • addObserver

      void addObserver(ModelObserver observer)
      Adds an observer (typically a maze editor) to this maze model so that it can be notified when this maze changes to refresh the editor display.
      Parameters:
      observer - A ModelObserver object

    • removeObserver

      boolean removeObserver(ModelObserver observer)
      Removes an observer (typically a maze editor) to this maze model. This observer will no longer be notified when this maze changes.
      Parameters:
      observer - A ModelObserver object
      Returns:
      true if this observer was actually removed, false otherwise.

    • setObservers

      void setObservers(Set<ModelObserver> observers)
      This method permits to set the observers of the maze. This method is intended to be used for deserialization.
      Parameters:
      observers - the observers of the maze

    • getWidth

      int getWidth()
      Returns this maze's width.
      Returns:
      The number of columns of this maze.

    • getHeight

      int getHeight()
      Returns this maze's height.
      Returns:
      The number of rows of this maze.

    • getMazeBox

      MazeBoxModel getMazeBox(int rowIndex, int colIndex)
      Returns the maze box located at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      rowIndex - The index of the row of required maze box. The the index starts at 0 located on the top of the maze and must be less than the maze's height.
      colIndex - The index of the column of required maze box. The the index starts at 0 located on the left of the maze and must be less than the maze's width.
      Returns:
      The required maze box model. null if the specified coordinates are invalid.

    • getNumberOfBoxes

      int getNumberOfBoxes()
      Returns the total number of boxes of this maze.
      Returns:
      The heigth * width value

    • clearMaze

      void clearMaze()
      Turns all the boxes of this maze to empty boxes.

    • clearShortestPath

      void clearShortestPath()
      Erases the maze's shortest path as computed when method solve was invoked on this maze.

    • solve

      boolean solve()
      Computes the shortest path of this maze and stores that information within this maze.
      Returns:
      true if a solution path was found for this maze, false otherwise.

    • validate

      List<String> validate()
      Check if this maze is valid for being solved; there should be only one departure and arrival box.
      Returns:
      A list of error messages for each invalid property of this maze. null or an empty list if this maze is valid.

    • getId

      String getId()
      Cette m√©thode permet d'obtenir l'identifient du labyrinthe
      Returns:
      L'identifiant du labyrinthe.

    • setId

      void setId(String mazeId)
      Cette m√©thode permet de r√©d√©finir l'identifiant du labyrinthe.
      Parameters:
      mazeId - Le nouveau identifiant du labyrinthe.
